inclusion.criterion: Obstetric patients aged 18 or more years
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Post-dural puncture headache (PDPH) after a confirmed or likely unintentional dural puncture with an epidural needle.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Medically suitable for and have consented to epidural blood patch (EBP) for treatment of PDPH
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous epidural blood patch (EBP) related to the same unintentional dural puncture (including prophylactic EBP)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: History of significant low or radicular back pain (requiring treatment) during pregnancy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of COPD and smokes 20 cigarettes per day, which may be relevant to the trial.
